name: Bioluminescent Jellyfish Tumblr Post Icons
description: These bioluminescent jellyfish on black square backgrounds with rounded corners post icons will work with any dashboard theme, but look best on a white post container. If you want something about these post icons customized to your tastes or have a request msg me for personalized assistance.
additional_info:
Comes with two different animation styles.* 
The shaking animation uses webkit animation coding as opposed to moz so it will not work on firefox.

style_setting_options.label: Lift on Hover
Shake on Hover
